snippet.title: ATONE: Heart of the Elder Tree | Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Play on Apple Arcade - https://apps.apple.com/us/app/atone-heart-of-the-elder-tree/id1450096689?itscg=30800&itsct=atoneheart

Release Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sSEULKNwcyY

ATONE: Heart of the Elder Tree is a story-driven puzzle game inspired by Norse Mythology and set in a 2D world comprised entirely of hand-drawn angular art. Players inherit the journey of a young warrior named Estra, solving puzzles and surviving rhythm game battle sequences as she ventures to unveil the truth behind her father’s death.

ATONE 
- Newsletter Sign Up - https://www.atonethegame.com/newsletter-sign-up
- Press Kit - https://www.atonethegame.com/press-kit
